title: Shibarium Testnet Reaches New Heights: Shiba Inu Records 25 Million Transactions and 17 Million Wallets
description: The total transactions recorded by the Shibarium testnet has crossed 25 million while the blocks processed has crossed 1.5 million. Shiba Inu team has recently introduced Shibacals, assigning NFTs to real-world assets for authentication. Puppynet, the beta testnet of the Layer-2 scalability platform Shibarium, continues to hit new milestones over the past few weeks. It [...]
